chunk:
Dr. Barbara Sturm Molecular Cosmetics Clarifying Serum (2019 formulation)

Brand: Dr. Barbara Sturm

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Propanediol, Lactobacillus/Portulaca Oleracea Ferment Extract, Zinc PCA, Phenoxyethanol, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Albatrellus Ovinus Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hexylene Glycol, Polygonum Bistorta Root Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Citric Acid, Caprylyl

Ethylhexylglycerin, Albatrellus Ovinus Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hexylene Glycol, Polygonum Bistorta Root Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol.

Directions: Pour one pipette length of the serum into the palm of your hand and apply it over your face by gently patting it into your skin.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
